description: This file defines a React component for handling the Jira OAuth callback page. It manages the OAuth response, displaying success or error messages, and redirects users accordingly.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Wraps the inner OAuth callback handling component with a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles the OAuth callback logic, displays messages, and manages redirection based on OAuth success or failure.
